channel.title: Does anyone know how to add in pk follow or a tut for it?
channel.description: Ive been trying for weeks to add pk following into my server.This is when you run after them and hit.Alot of abuse has came with this.Ive tried leeching it out of other servers but it did not work.Does anyone know any tut for it or knows how to do it?This is a deltascape based server.Thanks...
